message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  How about we meet halfway between our two prices at $160?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to come down a bit more?
